snippet: Ibrahim Boubacar Keita took the oath of office on Wednesday, promising to help unify the country after a rebellion, a coup and an Islamic insurgency.
abstract: Mali’s new Pres Ibrahim Boubacar Keita takes oath of office, promising to help unify country after rebellion, coup and Islamic insurgency plunged long democratic nation into near ruin.
lead_paragraph: Ibrahim Boubacar Keita took the oath of office on Wednesday, promising to help unify the country after a rebellion, a coup and an Islamic insurgency.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
